channel.title: Ggplot on We'll Have To Look At The Data
channel.description: Recent content in Ggplot on We'll Have To Look At The Data

item.title: A Not That Great Attempt at Simulating the World Cup Draw
item.description: On Friday, famous crisp addict Gary Lineker will host the FIFA World Cup 2018 draw in at the Kremlin, to determine the groups for next summer’s men’s football World Cup, in Russia. This is quite an exciting event, with lots of pomp and circumstance. (It goes on too long, but the drama of the draw itself is good). It may also bring some hubris: after the 2010 draw, where England were grouped with the USA, Slovenia, and Algeria, we were overjoyed that such an ostensibly easy group would allow easy progress.
